full_title: KAKSS Cast Iron Kettlebell 6kg, Black & White Void-Free Kettlebells with Smooth Seamless Handle & Wide Flat Base for Home Gym Strength Training and Fitness

reasoning.keyword_integration_strategy: Prioritized 'kettlebell' and 'kettlebells' (high-volume kettlebell-specific keywords) over 'dumbbell' keywords which were incorrect for the product. Wove in 'home gym', 'strength training', and 'fitness' as primary use-case phrases. Integrated verified product features ('Cast Iron', 'Void-Free', 'Smooth Seamless Handle', 'Wide Flat Base') to create a natural, descriptive title.
